BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. VESSEL JESUS SOBRE AS AGUAS I, FOUR PERSONS
   ON BOARD, UNREPORTED. LAST KNOWN POSITION
   03-09S 038-30W AT 281113Z AUG.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
   A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO ANY COASTAL RADIO STATION.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2122/15.
